component.name: wormhole-gui
component.summary: Cross-platform graphical user interface for easy encrypted sharing of files, folders, and text between devices.

description.p: Wormhole-gui is a cross-platform graphical interface for [magic-wormhole](https://github.com/magic-wormhole/magic-wormhole) that lets you easily share files, folders and text between computers on the local network. It uses the Go implementation of magic-wormhole, called [wormhole-william](https://github.com/psanford/wormhole-william), and compiles statically into a single binary. Wormhole-gui is compatible with the cli applications from both [wormhole-william](https://github.com/psanford/wormhole-william) and [magic-wormhole](https://github.com/magic-wormhole/magic-wormhole).
